findYourQuickstart.subtext: Monitor everything in your stack with 500+ integrations.

dataDictionary.title: New Relic data dictionary
dataDictionary.intro: This data dictionary defines some of our default-reported data stored in NRDB and queryable via NRQL. This includes events like Transaction, MobileRequest, and BrowserInteraction, and our Metric, Log, and Span data types. These definitions are also available from our query builder UI by mousing over applicable data type and attribute names.
introNot: Data from our infrastructure integrations (for that, see docs for a specific integration)
Detailed integration-specific attributes for Metric data
dataDictionary.callout: This dictionary does not contain data reported by Infrastructure integrations. To learn about that data, see the <2>integration documentation</2>.

intro.p1: New to New Relic? Read our <2>Introduction to New Relic doc</2>. Or get started right now by creating an account and installing New Relic:

t1.title: Monitor all your apps and services

installFeedback.question: Did this doc help with your installation?
installFeedback.prompt: Tell us how can we do this better.
installFeedback.emailDisclaimer: We'll only use this email for follow-up questions about your feedback.

intro.title: Complete visibility and analytics at your fingertips
text: Our application performance monitoring (APM) provides a unified monitoring service for all your apps and microservices.

Monitor everything from the hundreds of dependencies of a modern stack down to simple web-transaction times and throughput of an app. Keep track of your app's health in real-time by monitoring your metrics, events, logs, and transactions (MELT) through pre-built and custom dashboards.

list: Observe the performance of your application by installing one of our agents - it takes just minutes!
Monitor the performance and health of all your services in one place
Pair New Relic with OpenTelemetry or other open source tools
block1.subTitle: See the health of all your services in a glance

block2.title: More than just APM
block2.text: Our agents automatically instrument and report:

list: Ingest all your logs automatically with our APM agents
See all your logs in one place
block3.subTitle: Log Management

list: Ingest common vulnerabilities and exposures (CVEs) automatically with our APM agents
Manage the security of your services with zero config
block3.subTitle: Vulnerability management

list: Monitor latency, errors, traffic, saturation, and Apdex scores to identify bottlenecks and optimize performance for your users
Use prebuilt dashboards to identify and triage errors and other poor user experiences
block4.subTitle: Ensure a great user experience

block5.subTitle: Proactive error management
block5.text: Is your early-access software still slightly unstable? Proactively monitor and solve those errors before they affect your users with errors inbox.

block5.subTitle: Measure user satisfaction
block5.text: Do your users always comment on how speedy your web app is and you want to quantify that feedback? Measure their satisfaction by monitoring your Apdex at a glance.

block5.subTitle: Automatic log ingest
block5.text: Need somewhere to store your logs? Our agents automatically ingest them.

block5.subTitle: Track dependancies
block5.text: Does your modern stack has dozens or even hundreds of dependencies to keep track of? Easily track them with automap and external services.

quickstartChooser.blurbLineOne: Click a logo to get started with APM.
quickstartChooser.blurbLineTwo: It takes just a few minutes!
quickstartChooser.heading: Want to save time with a single unified monitoring solution?
